contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 5, 1884 D Skegness Contest
Skegness Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
skegness-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Skegness, Lincolnshire, England, UK Mr Gladney did not turn up, so a local blind man was deputed to be the adjudicator. After each band had played the blind umpire was nonplussed and declared he could not decide on their respective merits, as all appeared so equal. Mr Gladney eventually appeared, shortly before 5pm, and the bands replayed their selections and he was able to give his awards. 1st contest promoted by South Notts Temperance Band. Prizes - 1st £20, 2nd £12, 3rd £8, 4th £4. 4 bands competed
Dec. 28, 2012, 6:25 p.m. May 6, 2019, 9:34 a.m.
1 Black Dyke Band Harry Bower Heroic
2 Wyke Hugh Whitham Stiffelio [arr. Gladney]
3 Rotherham Volunteers George Fred Birkenshaw Rossini's Works
4 Long Eaton Temperance Band Unknown
